summary: Defines dataset classes that load token‑tag pairs from TSV files using a BERT example builder and expose them as sequence‑compatible datasets for the Thutmose tagger model, supporting both training and inference workflows.
business_intent: Enable efficient preparation and feeding of text‑normalization‑as‑tagging data to the Thutmose tagger within the NeMo NLP framework, facilitating model development and evaluation.
